Controls.Description: All teams/groups must be granted minimum required permissions on release defination
Controls.Rationale: Granting minimum access by leveraging RBAC feature ensures that users are granted just enough permissions to perform their tasks. This minimizes exposure of the resources in case of user/service account compromise.

Controls.Description: Secrets and keys must not be stored as plain text in release variables
Controls.Rationale: Keeping secrets such as connection strings, passwords, keys, etc. in clear text can lead to easy compromise. Making them secret type variables ensures that they are protected at rest.
